entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Threat model reviews #47170
  • APICompat doesn't catch changing existing member to abstract #47166

Closed

  • ResolvePackageAssets throws IndexOutOfRangeException when reading its cache #28577
    Backlog
  • dotnet solution remove - smart project detection #47111
  • PGO Instrumented SDK fails to bind to CoreCLR on Windows #47079
  • .NET 10 Preview 1 MAUI baseline manifests need to be updated. #45035
  • dotnet format throws because it can't determine file encodings in 9.0.200 #46780
  • manpages should live in installer repo so they are included in .deb, .rpm, .tar.gz and macOS .pkg #29067

PullRequests

Created

  • Check shipping packages for poison #47176
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool-update: add --prerelease-skip flag #47174
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Skip CanIgnoreTemplateGroupsWithConstraints #47173
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sbrp cleanup test #47172
    DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47171
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update to released .NET MAUI manifests #47165
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • (Draft) allowed-labels: Delete previous runs #47164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • `dotnet sln remove` smart project matching #47112
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ignore .lutconfig files via .gitignore #47029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't scan src dirs for project.assets.json files #47162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to released .NET MAUI manifests #47160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix version badge moniker for linux-musl-* #47156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Unify line endings #47161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build tests on Linux and Windows #47106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Regex pattern in test for dotnet test #47132
    Area-dotnet test

Updated

  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix home calculation Fixes #46821 #46836
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2652225 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47064
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • Delete workload-related things if the rest of the operation was unsuccessful #47110
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove underscore from `_UseManagedNtlm` #47141
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
